title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5250.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5250.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

All law enforcement agencies have a common goal of providing
the highest level of police protection to the communities they serve. Fulfilling that goal requires the coordination and cooperation of all law
enforcement agencies at the local, county and State levels. In the interest of
providing the highest levels of law enforcement services and protection to the
public, the Legislature has therefore required the 911 Board to adopt minimum
standards for jurisdictional protocols. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5250.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
